nodes.name: UV Package Manager
nodes.description: UV v0.9.30 integration: slate_uv.py management module, uv.lock (251 packages), 120x speedup over pip (148ms vs 17,767ms), pre-release support for semantic-kernel deps

nodes.name: Discord Bot
nodes.description: Webhook-based Discord notifications: 4 channels (builds/status/alerts/progress), SLATE brand-colored embeds, rate limiting, event routing, zero-dependency (urllib only), env-var config

nodes.name: Multi-Runner System
nodes.description: 19 parallel runners across 2 GPUs with resource-aware task distribution

nodes.name: VSCode SDK Integration
nodes.description: Local VSCode plugins synced to GitHub as complete SDK

nodes.name: Schematic Diagram SDK
nodes.description: Circuit-board style diagram generation for system visualization

nodes.name: Copilot SDK Integration
nodes.description: GitHub Copilot SDK submodule with 14 SLATE tools, session manager, BYOK providers, MCP configs

nodes.name: Autonomous Task Loop
nodes.description: Unified autonomous loop with 5-source discovery, ML classification, agent routing, self-healing

nodes.name: Specification System
nodes.description: Spec-driven development with spec-kit processing, wiki generation, and roadmap tracking

nodes.description: Kubernetes manifests for SLATE deployment â€” namespace, RBAC, deployments, network policies, dashboard service discovery

nodes.name: Dual-GPU Manager

nodes.name: Custom SLATE Models
nodes.description: Ollama-based custom models: slate-coder (12B), slate-fast (3B), slate-planner (7B)

nodes.name: Vendor Fork Sync
nodes.description: Fork management for 16 vendor dependencies: OpenAI agents, Microsoft SK/AutoGen, NVIDIA TensorRT/NeMo, HuggingFace transformers

nodes.name: Vendor SDK Integration
nodes.description: Unified SDK integration for 5 vendors: openai-agents, autogen, semantic-kernel, copilot-sdk, spec-kit with import helpers and type bridges

nodes.description: Specification for unified vendor SDK integration layer

nodes.description: Specification for parallel runner infrastructure across dual GPUs

nodes.description: Specification for Claude Code plugin and Agent SDK integration

nodes.description: Specification for load-balanced dual-GPU management

nodes.description: Specification for custom Ollama models training and deployment

nodes.name: Spec 021: Autonomous Task Loop
nodes.description: Specification for unified autonomous loop with self-healing capabilities

nodes.name: Unified AI Backend
nodes.description: Central AI routing with 3 providers: Ollama, Claude Code, Foundry Local. Task classification and failover logic.

nodes.name: Claude Code Full Integration
nodes.description: Full Claude Code integration: MCP server (12 tools), plugin manifest, hooks, behaviors, instruction loader, copilot bridge, FORGE.md coordination

nodes.name: Token Management System
nodes.description: Complete local token system: 7 token types, SHA-256 hashed storage, auto-rotation, audit logging, 26 bootstrapped tokens for services/agents/plugins

nodes.name: Brand Identity System
nodes.description: Complete SLATE brand system: brand engine (slate_brand.py), design tokens (JSON/CSS/Python), 6 logo variants, 2 themes, brand dashboard page, color propagation validation, 18 brand assets, 127/127 tokens synced

nodes.name: SLATE Avatar System
nodes.description: Living avatar system: state engine (slate_avatar.py), 17 nodes/4 rings/22 connections, D3.js orrery visualization, orbital animation, health jewels, evolution levels 1-5, Level 3 achieved at 84.1% completion

nodes.name: TRELLIS.2 3D Integration
nodes.description: TRELLIS.2 4B image-to-3D client (slate_trellis.py), K8s manifest (port 8086), TrellisProvider for unified AI backend, asset management with manifest tracking, NetworkPolicy, PVC storage (16Gi model + 8Gi assets)

nodes.name: GraphRAG Knowledge System
nodes.description: In-memory knowledge graph with JSON persistence: 177 entities (104 modules, 20 specs, 9 services, 44 tech nodes), 141 relations (75 imports, 60 deps, 6 service connections), BFS traversal, hybrid RAG context generation

nodes.name: Prompt Compression (LLMLingua)
nodes.description: Multi-strategy prompt compression engine: whitespace, boilerplate, comments, imports, importance scoring. 4.0x average compression (CLAUDE.md 5.6x, README.md 8.0x). Enables 4x more context within 16GB VRAM inference windows

nodes.name: Spec 022: Brand Identity System
nodes.description: Specification for complete SLATE brand identity across all surfaces

nodes.name: Spec 023: Avatar System
nodes.description: Specification for SLATE avatar: 2D orrery + 3D TRELLIS.2 generation

nodes.name: Spec 024: TRELLIS.2 Integration
nodes.description: Specification for Microsoft TRELLIS.2 3D generation as K8s microservice
